description: Demolition of the existing buildings; erection of buildings comprising 47 two bedroom, 18 one bedroom and 5 three bedroom flats and 11 three bedroom houses and 1986 sqm of commercial floorspace B1(c); provision of associated amenity, refuse and parking areas
